content: 1 then turn row 20 repeat row 1 row 21 single_crochet 1 fpdc 1 around fpdc from two row back skip 1 st 4 times single_crochet 1 chain 1 then turn row 22-31 repeat row 19 and 21 row 32 single_crochet 4 chain 1 skip 1 st single_crochet 4 your card holder will look like photo 3 at this point note the chain 1 space creates the hole used to fasten the holder photo 4 fasten_off cut the yarn and weave in the ends note weaving ends down the sides of the piece will hide them nicely photo 3 photo 4 ribbon cast on with color 2 starting at the back of the card holder where the chain 1 space is photo 5 single_crochet down the center keeping stitches as uniform as possible fasten_off cut the yarn and weave in the ends your card holder will look like photo 6 at this point photo 5 photo 6 ~ 3 ~ bow create a magic_ring chain 7 slip_stitch into magic_ring 7 times chain 20 slip_stitch into magic_ring to create longer ornament hanger for fastening pull the magic_ring tight fasten_off and cut the yarn leave one end long for sewing and weave in the other end finishing fold the card holder in half cast on with color 1 with the front of the card holder facing you slip_stitch evenly across one side of the holder to stitch it closed photo 6 approx 14 stitches but your mileage may vary then fasten_off and cut the yarn repeat for the other side sew the bow to the front center of the card holder ensuring that the hanger is aligned up weave in remaining ends photo 6 ~ 4 ~
